verbose_text: However, excessive ER stress (TM> = 10 muM) activated the ER stress mediated apoptosis signaling pathways, including PKR like ER kinase (PERK)-eukaryotic translational initiation factor 2alpha (eIF2alpha)-activating transcription factor 4 (ATF4)-CCAAT/-enhancer-binding protein homologous protein (CHOP) and inositol requiring kinase 1alpha (IRE1alpha)-c-Jun N-terminal kinases (JNK), as well as inhibited the expression of FGF21 and its primary receptors.
evidence: ER stress (TM >=10 muM) activated the ER stress-mediated apoptosis signaling pathways, including PKR
